body:
# elm-conf 2020 is cancelled

As of June 7, elm-conf 2020 is cancelled.
If you previously registered, you'll receive an email with details about refunds (but as a summary: we'll be refunding your ticket in full.)

Many factors went into this decision, but the most important is this: over the past few days, each member of the elm-conf team independently needed to step back from organizing.
With a reduced organizer capacity, I can longer put on the event this year.
I know that many of you will be disappointedâ€”I am too, but I think it's the right choice given what's happening in the world right now.

Thanks,  
Brian Hicks, lead organizer, elm-conf
